turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two large pizzas, one with sausage and onion and the other one veggie lovers, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. Did you want regular crust on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like thick crust on both of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.You want 2 large pizzas with thick crust, 1 with sausage and onion, and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $44.59 is the total for the order. Should i charge the card on file now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been submitted. It'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, you're very welcome. Enjoy those pizzas.
